import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";// Material Dashboard 2 React Helper Functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var white=colors.white,text=colors.text,info=colors.info,secondary=colors.secondary;var size=typography.size;var contained={base:{backgroundColor:white.main,minHeight:pxToRem(40),color:text.main,padding:"".concat(pxToRem(10)," ").concat(pxToRem(24)),"&:hover":{backgroundColor:white.main},"&:active, &:active:focus, &:active:hover":{opacity:0.85},"& .material-icon, .material-icons-round, svg":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(16)," !important")}},small:{minHeight:pxToRem(32),padding:"".concat(pxToRem(6)," ").concat(pxToRem(16)),fontSize:size.xs,"& .material-icon, .material-icons-round, svg":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(12)," !important")}},large:{minHeight:pxToRem(47),padding:"".concat(pxToRem(12)," ").concat(pxToRem(28)),fontSize:size.sm,"& .material-icon, .material-icons-round, svg":{fontSize:"".concat(pxToRem(22)," !important")}},primary:{backgroundColor:info.main,"&:hover":{backgroundColor:info.main},"&:focus:not(:hover)":{backgroundColor:info.focus}},secondary:{backgroundColor:secondary.main,"&:hover":{backgroundColor:secondary.main},"&:focus:not(:hover)":{backgroundColor:secondary.focus}}};export default contained;
